title: T3PR00T
author: T3PR00T
content: Type: neutralSender: JollyGood Receiver: joker_josueQuoteRevised: joker_josue made a post in my Premier League thread which was to say at the least incoherent thus was deleted and feedback given stating he was making low quality posts.After being requested to review the tag I obliged first by removing it then modifying it.Observation/Comment: A neutral feedback was revised and replaced with another feedback for a post made on a thread 游때.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: I noticed your title says "collection," but I only see one neutral feedback example here. And to be honest, not particularly fun to read, in my humble opinion. Are there any more feedbacks you can share to make it more interesting?

comments.author: T3PR00T
comments.body: I read a lot as I am on phone. The goal for this topic to post the feedback that make me simile. I hope others can have fun too.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: I don't know what you expect with this thread. It's neither a collection nor do I see the fun to read feedback. It is a neutral feedback, therefore with little repercussion, if any, and it is surely true that joker_josue wrote a low quality post at the time, for which I personally would not bother to write a feedback if it is only one, but I don't know what's so funny about it.

comments.author: nutildah
comments.body: You should probably move this to Off-Topic. Seems like if you had anything worthwhile to say you'd be posting it from your main account."Ah but theymos says we should use alt accounts to post stuff we're not comfortable with posting from our main account."Yes but 99% of the time it is for dumb shit-stirring like this, which is why you're not posting it from your real account.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I was expecting something of multiple things to look at, but there's just one. And it's not even fun. Like I don't understand the fun of what you have posted here. Can you elaborate more than what you said and process it easily? I'm not sure that I follow.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Op btw why did you choose to go for @joker_josue profile?If you take a look at this forum you'll see different tags that are interesting and laughable to and sometimes even makes you want to know the full gist behind the tag, but instead you went for that tag and aside that you added "collection" int your title and post only a single tag.I feel that something fishy is going on here, did he by any chance do something that made you want to create this thread to get back at him? I can't really get my head around any reason why someone would just sit down and start looking for ways to mock others. This is mockery, JSYK.

comments.author: T3PR00T
comments.body: It's fun to read some many directions of speculation for a pre mature thread.Check it back after few weeks once I bump it. For now please forget about what's in the subject and description.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: T3PR00T on May 25, 2023, 08:32:20 PMType: neutralSender: JollyGood Receiver: joker_josueQuoteRevised: joker_josue made a post in my Premier League thread which was to say at the least incoherent thus was deleted and feedback given stating he was making low quality posts.After being requested to review the tag I obliged first by removing it then modifying it.Observation/Comment: A neutral feedback was revised and replaced with another feedback for a post made on a thread 游때. This would have been a great thread only if you tried to collect atleast 10 feedbacks that are funny to read. Put more efforts and people will visit this thread for fun and discussions.JG is known for being strick and at times dramatic with giving feedbacks. I have seen where JG used someone's feedback space as a note or a bookmark for self

comments.author: MinMan
comments.body: JollyGood is new Lauda?At least 2 topics on JollyGood's feedback in the top 10 topics here in reputation board...

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: T3PR00T on May 26, 2023, 01:08:07 PMIt's fun to read some many directions of speculation for a pre mature thread.Check it back after few weeks once I bump it. For now please forget about what's in the subject and description.If this is, as you say, a premature thread, and I believe it may be, then why did you create it?In the future, it may be helpful to take some time to fully develop your idea before starting a new topic.

comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on May 25, 2023, 10:33:21 PMI noticed your title says "collection," but I only see one neutral feedback example here. And to be honest, not particularly fun to read, in my humble opinion. Are there any more feedbacks you can share to make it more interesting?Maybe the OP was hoping others would start adding funny feedback they read in order to make the thread have some content but thus far that has not transpired.Quote from: KingsDen on May 26, 2023, 11:27:58 PMThis would have been a great thread only if you tried to collect atleast 10 feedbacks that are funny to read. Put more efforts and people will visit this thread for fun and discussions.Yes I agree with you. I have seen where JG used someone's feedback space as a note or a bookmark for self Some time ago I noticed Hhampuz writing on the lines of note-to-self when he left feedback therefore I thought it could be something useful for me to use when needed. comments.author: stompix

For now please forget about what's in the subject and description.Then, outrageous idea but how about you lock this until you have something that is actually funny?But before doing this, can you actually tell me why is the feedback JG sent funny and not the ones he received?I mean:Quotehater account he don't understand what he do , i think if he ownest will not try to hurt others but sure you are fail in be developer may be so keep on posting may be collect some moneyWARNING is a SCAMMER! Many the positive feedback he has from scammers harming Earths and universal base income program.kids a faggot posts useless shitOh, and before you go there, it's an old story and everyone knows it, even Satoshi:QuoteAlt of stompix. comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: T3PR00T on May 25, 2023, 08:32:20 PMType: neutralSender: JollyGood Receiver: joker_josueQuoteRevised: joker_josue made a post in my Premier League thread which was to say at the least incoherent thus was deleted and feedback given stating he was making low quality posts.After being requested to review the tag I obliged first by removing it then modifying it.Observation/Comment: A neutral feedback was revised and replaced with another feedback for a post made on a thread 游때. Negative and neutral feedbacks bring sad memories so they are not funny or experience to laugh over. It might be funny to you but brought pain to the victims. I looked at the thread created by @joker_josue to solicit support so that the neutral tag can be reversed and I will not want to go through such a process because it could lead to confrontation and antagonism. My take is that there is no need for this thread because it will bring back sad memories. It will be better to create a collection of commendable positive feedback that will motivate members to contribute positively to the forum.
